description: A love story between a DJ and his most sought-after record.
name: Spin

review.name: guy goes to budapest, gets stranded and then has to make enough cash to buy a ticket home
review.reviewBody: I saw this movie at the 2004 seattle international film festival, and i thought it was pretty cool. you'll probably like this movie if you've gone to parties or have been down with the electronic music scene. i think this dj dude goes to budapest and somehow fall into djing weird hungarian music for some traditional party. anyways, that's only a smidgen of all the off the wall mischief this guy gets into. stuff with pornstars, getting chased by cops, and all sorts of wackiness -even a little flash of bestiality- just kidding. other than all the crazy action, the music in this film is freaking awesome. lots of dope beats in this, mostly breaks i believe. i forget how this movie ends, but i thought it was an alright movie compared to all the other artsy crap that was at the festival. some people try so hard to make a poignant statement, but the makers of this film pretty much captured an exciting story about some American dude going to hungary and having quite an adventure. go see it;)
